#summary #summary How to integrate Jzon in your project
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Introduction =

There are two ways to integrate Jzon in your project.

= Solution 1 =

The easiest and recommended way is to just copy Jzon.h and Jzon.cpp directly into your project folder.

= Solution 2 =

The other way is to build a static or dynamic library, but I'm not going to go into any detail on how it's done.
